unnormalised: **Automotive: EV Charging Getting a Desi Twist!**
normalised: Automotive: E V Charging Getting a Desi Twist!

unnormalised: Guess what, petrolheads? The EV revolution is hitting India hard, and charging infrastructure is the name of the game. Forget those boring European charging stations, we're talking desi innovation!
normalised: Guess what, petrolheads? The E V revolution is hitting India hard, and charging infrastructure is the name of the game. Forget those boring European charging stations, we're talking desi innovation!

unnormalised: IIT Madras is reportedly working on some super-efficient charging tech, promising faster top-ups for your Nexon EV. Think chai break speed, not the whole lunch spread!
normalised: I I T Madras is reportedly working on some super-efficient charging tech, promising faster top-ups for your Nexon E V. Think chai break speed, not the whole lunch spread!

unnormalised: Tata Power is aggressively expanding its network, aiming for a charger every few kilometers on major highways. Imagine cruising from Mumbai to Bangalore, guilt-free and with readily available charging points. Sweet!
normalised: Tata Power is aggressively expanding its network, aiming for a charger every few kilometers on major highways. Imagine cruising from Mumbai to Bangalore, guilt-free and with readily available charging points. Sweet!

unnormalised: And here's a kicker: Reliance is rumored to be partnering with Jio to bundle EV charging with their home internet plans. Free charging with your fiber connection? Game-changer!
normalised: And here's a kicker: Reliance is rumored to be partnering with Jio to bundle E V charging with their home internet plans. Free charging with your fiber connection? Game-changer!

unnormalised: Rumours floating that during Onam, some Kerala petrol pumps offered free EV charging with a purchase of Rs. 500 or more.
normalised: Rumours floating that during Onam, some Kerala petrol pumps offered free E V charging with a purchase of rupees five hundred or more.

unnormalised: Plus, local companies are popping up building charging solutions, hoping to corner a piece of the ever-growing pie. The competition is hotting up!
normalised: Plus, local companies are popping up building charging solutions, hoping to corner a piece of the ever-growing pie. The competition is hotting up!

unnormalised: With biryani-fuelled road trips becoming electric, the future looks bright (and silent!). Keep an eye on this space!
normalised: With biryani-fuelled road trips becoming electric, the future looks bright (and silent!). Keep an eye on this space!
